ref: 13982 hariṇá ʻ yellow ʼ MaitrUp. 2. m. ʻ deer ʼ RV., hariṇīˊ -- 1 f. ʻ doe ʼ TS., hariṇaka -- m. ʻ small deer ʼ Kād. [Ac. to J. Przyluski JA 1929, 319 hariṇá -- ʻ deer ʼ ← Austro -- as., but Mu. words there quoted are ← IA. <-> hári -- ]
K. haryunu ʻ having shoots or buds just bursting forth ʼ (or perh. rather der. from har < śára -- 1).
